channel.title: Help with spammers and nullers and crashers
channel.description:
HOW DO I STOP SPAMMERS AN CRASHERS?
sypkers come on and multi nullers what spam another server ip, sypkers things crash my server with like 300 chars
please helppp
thanks
its a guy called "sheep" who wants hidden admin an i will not give it him, so he spamms, nulls, an trys to crash my server but i turn it off be4 then, but when i turn it back on the syi thing their straight away.
he said he uses proxy, idk

zane02:

i wanted to use that guide Si Force, but its super long lol. Does it stop nullers though?

i don’t think so.

item.title: Help with spammers and nullers and crashers
item.dc:creator: @Chaostheory Chaostheory
item.description:
@Chaostheory wrote:

You can block his Internet provider if you can find out what it is. I’m not sure on how to do that. Or you can Just Ip ban him on his range of Ip Address’s.

Read full topic
